molecular.geometry.normal¶

molecular.geometry.normal(a, b, c=None)[source]¶

Compute normal vector between three points.

Parameters

  • a (ArrayLike) – Cartesian coordinates.

  • b (ArrayLike) – Cartesian coordinates.

  • c (ArrayLike) – Cartesian coordinates.

Returns

Vector normal

Return type

numpy.ndarray
